content.detailedDescription:
Around the year 2000 to 2002 very early in the morning around 04:00 i walked out of my house to go to work and noticed 3 lights in a triangle pattern in the sky. they didn't seem very high in the sky, maybe 200 ft or so. they kinda hovered and moved slowly and changed direction a couple of times but when it did it was slow in doing so. at the time i really didn't think too much of it but watched it for approx 4 to 5 minutes because i thought it was odd with absolutely no sound at all and no airports anywhere near the area i lived in. i did not think at all to document it since i at the time i just wrote it off that it had to be something that would be explained easily, i did live approx 15 miles from pratt & whitney in palm beach gardens. i lost sight of it when i got in my car to go to work. it was still moving slowly hovering kind of but now moving away from me.

i am reporting it now for documentation purposes to see if maybe someone else may have seen it as well.

i was watching a program about a year ago and saw what i saw and realized i should have watched it longer and tried to at least shine my light on it. i had a very powerful flood light in my car but obviously didn't want to get in trouble for shining it at an aircraft.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Walked out of house to go to work and noticed triangle pattern lights in sky

content.detailedDescription: Triangular ufo appeared in northern night sky, as if cloaking devise was disengaged for a few seconds. triangle flew in a straight path at a fast rate to the west. obect was roatating counter-clockwise and in mid-flight changed to a clockwise rotation all while still traveling west ward before vanishing or cloak re-engaged.
content.summary: Black triangle, 3white lights, one in each corner.

content.detailedDescription: Walked out back of resturant heard loud hum looked out saw a triange of lights big hundreds of feet long the lights at the edges flashed and a huge rocket plume was in the middle burning off but not rising or falling like you think a roket would "shoot off" just spinning around and the lights at the end would blink but always kept the plume in the middle as it spun around the lights would move up and down and always kept the plume in the middle. the actual body of the triange was not visable only the lights and the rocket plume it lasted for a while i tried to call people in the kitchen to come see but my eyes were glued to this thing and i didnt want to go get somone and miss it i have a flip book i drew but sadly i cannot put it into the computer eventually the rocket plume went out and it dissapeared. although i could not see the structure the lights always keeping the plume in the middle and no matter where it spun the lights blinking and always being the at the edge keeping it centered i felt it was a huge solid triangle even though nothing was there to see of the body
content.summary: Triange of lights on the edges flashing with a huge rocket plume in the middle lights flashing back and forth as the rocket plume spun all around but the lights always followed the plume on the edges. it was loud

content.detailedDescription: Orange orb started low on the eastern horizon across lake , flew slow and straight for approximately 10 minutes in a westerly direction, maybe 10000 feet and slowly rising towards the moon, then disappearing in the moonlight.
content.summary: Orange orb started low on the eastern horizon across lake , flew slow and straight for approximately 10 minutes in a westerly direction, maybe 10000 feet and slowly rising towards the moon, then disappearing in the moonlight.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying down at work relaxing until it was time to get back to work. saw a object very high in the sky. it looked like a star but it was the middle of day and no other stars around. it seem to be moving slow( that's how it caught my attention). then was stationary for a min or so. the started to move. i still watched for a min or so and saw 2 smaller objects go to the object very quickly. the smaller objects didn't come out the other side or appear again at all. the larger object kept moving at same "slow" rate. then it was out of view. that took about 5 or 6 min. i sat there wondering then decide to change my location. it took about 2 min. the object was gone. i went to a huge open area and at the rate it was mo ing before it's no way it would've been gone that fast. i thought it was a loose ballon maybe at first but the none motion to the movement seemed to controlled. it thought i was crazy for a moment and blamed it on the fact that once i seriously noticed and paid attention i started seeing "stars" but i shook it of and the object was still there. this is the 2nd and most convincing time this has happened to me at this job.....Or ever for that matter.
content.summary: Relaxing at work looking at sky. saw some thing. the more i looked it got weird. moved to continue my observation and it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
8/11/11

now this was some time ago, and having been so long my date and time of day are entirely approximated, however i am certain of what i saw and many of the details are still with me in my memory.

about four years ago and during the middle of the afternoon i left my house and began driving on a road just around the corner.  i reached the first stop sign, no more than a minute away from my house, and saw something above me in the sky.  now i don't know if it was shock, or panic, or disbelief, but i was in such a frantic hurry to step out of my car and get a better look that the second my hand found the door handle i literally fell out of the side of my car and onto the road.  i stood up and watched as an enormous black triangle moved away from me, traveling in the opposite direction that my car was facing.  i remember it as being very low to the ground, and surprisingly silent.  it was moving so slowly that i couldn't believe it to be any sort of conventional aircraft.  down the bottom of each side were (maybe four?) round lights.  i stood and watched as it moved slowly away from me, at which point my memory of the sighting is finished.  i cannot recall if i watched it travel out of sight, or if it simply disappeared as it does as i try to relive the experience in my head today.  i remember being in such a state of shock throughout the event that any notion of taking a picture with my cell phone never occurred to me.  immediately afterwards, however, i saved whatever details i could into my cell phone as a draft to the person i had been texting with most recently.  this was because i was so hurried in preserving what i could that i simply opened the fastest medium on which i could record.  the words i saved read something like "low, silent, black triangle, lights down each side."  i then returned to my car, turned around, and drove straight back home.  any intentions of continuing to wherever i was heading were completely forgotten.  i told a few people, namely my parents and a couple of friends, what i had seen, but i was just met with skepticism and a condescending disbelief.  i haven't talked about it much since then, however i have seen remarkably similar images portrayed on various ufo sighting tv shows.  in fact, i just finished watching one which put the incident back into the front of my mind, and now i feel so compelled to share the encounter with someone who might put the information to use that it has been driving me crazy for the past hour or so.  if i find the cell phone on which i saved the draft, i will also find the specific date and time of the incident.  i haven't even tried searching since i am currently so obsessed with getting this out.  i hope my description helps, and i would appreciate it if anybody with additional or relevant information might contact me.
content.summary: Low, silent, large, slow moving, black triangle, lights down each side

content.detailedDescription: I started to lie down in bed with the curtains open and decided to lay down and look at the stars when i noticed this thing flying high in the sky, as i paid more attention to it, the object got started moving in no way i've seen before. it was making moves like no aircraft made by man had made before. at first i thought i was just seeing things, but as i watched it move the way it did another one seemed to appear and take my eye off that one and as i watched the other one i went back to look at the one i had seen and it was gone and no longer there. as i now watched this one it changed too and another then appeared and the same thing happened. i felt my heart race for a bit. but i then needed to get my camera so i could get a picture as i came back to get a picture the things had all gone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Unknown
content.summary: If you watched it, it would have 3 of the same in the sky they moved so fast.

content.detailedDescription: I made basically this same observation the day before at the exact same time though this time there were 3 other witnesses.  the object was closer to my location than the day before or a little north and a little closer west.  there were a few more clouds on tuesday but passed in front of the object.  again it was very high up.  since then i've seen airplanes flying very high and from my perspective, they looked to be about 1/4" in length whereas this object was even much higher than the highest flying planes i've seen and both objects appeared very similar in size and compared to the high flying planes was only half the size of them.  i had to go back into work at 5:15pm and the object was still stationary as i walked through the door.  this makes 2 days in a row, in slightly different locations but at the exact same times.  i obviously had my eyes to the sky yesterday, but didn't see a thing and watched at 5, then again at 7 for half an hour and again at 9:30pm for 15 minutes and didn't see anything.  i'm not there tonight but i damn sure will be tomorrow night.  again this sighting included 4 of us and i don't think any of the other witnesses would mind giving their personal info if necessary.  i would have thought if it were a planet or star, the object would be visible for a few days in a row but not being an astronomer, it would only be speculation.  tell you what though, i haven't been this excited in a long time and hope i have many more reports to make to you.
content.summary: A small drop of white-out very far away.

content.detailedDescription: This took place at 11:55. i had just set my alarm clock, so i knew the exact time. i walked across my room to shut a window. i looked out the window and saw in the western sky, a large ball of pulsating light. i noted that the object was similar to another that had been seen earlier this year. the only exception to its similarity was the size. in my previous sighting the object was 2x as large and the object lit the room through curtains waking me up. this recent incident had a much longer duration. i watched the object fly for approximately 7 minutes. while it flew it pulsated green, yellow, blue, orange, and white colors. of course i assumed that this was an air plane, then realized that there had been strong storms during the day and were forcasted for the night, that no planes coming from a very small air port 23 miles away. that air port is also across a mountain pass that is over 6,000 feet in elevation. the object disappeared when a flash of lightning struck near the home. i watched the sky and the object was gone.
content.summary: A large orb of pulsating light with high rate of speed with sharp directional change

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i parked near home when i looked up and saw a dozen or more strange orange lights "floating". we got out of the car and watched them, and at that time the went, almost evenly spaced, in a nearly straight line, from where they were south/southwest, then took a 90 degree turn west then slowly dissipated, one by one.

what was strange was the speed of the lights, which only a helicopter or balloon would travel at, combined with the flickering orange-ish glow, and the sequential path of each one in a straight line, then dissipation completely from sight. floating candle lanterns don't have as bright or consistent of light displayed, nor are they as orange/reddish as these, nor do they float in a straight line for roughly a mile or more.

i've attached a camera phone video my wife took, which is unfortunately sideways, then upside-down. it shows 3 or more of the orange lights for a few seconds.
content.summary: Dozen or more orange lights traveled slowly in nearly straight line then dissipated

content.detailedDescription:
It started on thursday night, the 4th. there were thrre of us sitting around talking outside when my dad pointed out the three bright lights, they looked liked street lights. one light vanished within 5 seconds, the other two dropped straight down about two inches in the sky, then also vanished. amazed we werent able to peel our eyes from the sky. we then noticed 2 flashing red lights travleing away from eachother, one to the north and other to the south. the light travleing to the north was keeping a steady pace when without any manuvering it did a 180 degree direction change in the blink of an eye and was now travleing south. as we kept watching it came to a complete stop in the sky then dropped maybe 3 or 4 inches in the sky to come to another complete stop. at this stime we noticed the other red light doing circles, 90 degree turns, up, down, left, right. they both lloked like a fly buzzing around in the sky. these two red lights never vanished, but kept flying around. a little while later we saw what we thought was two fighter jets head southwest, we watched them fly out of sight and display no odd flight patterns. within a couple minutes we saw what we thought again was 2 fighter jets headed due south now, as i kept watching one drifted off from the other now headed west, as i kept watching the othere headed due south i witnessed the same odd flight patterns as earlier, a fly in the sky. after that we all went to bed. 
i get home real early in the morning on monday the 8th to find another real bright light in the sky just like the first ones we saw on thursday the 4th. as soon as i saw it displaying the odd flight patterns from the other night, i ran and got our telescope. throught the scope i was able to clearly make out a perfectly cicrcular object. the surface looked like that of a basketball at first, kinda rough with dark lines and black spots on it. i could look away long enough to blink a couple times and the surface would appear completely different then before. while i was watching it all of a sudden it went all dark, invisible to the human eye, but was still able to make out its perimeter through the scope. not even a minute goes by and the object lights back up. i was able to see that same one until sun up that morning, even after the sun was up a little bit i could still see the reflection off of the object. that same night i witnessed over 30 of those red blinking lights from thursday the 4th. looking through the scope i could identify them as all looking the exact same, all of them were circular or sphere shape, all of them had the same changing surface, and all of them had some internal light source, their surface looked transparent. i could see a rainbow of colors insdide each one. this is now thursday the 11th and i have sat out the last three nights and observed the same objects with the same flight patterns. one night there was one bright enough that i could see it through my little digital camera, i have over a minute of video displaying the odd flight patterns, buzzing around like a fly in the sky. after i took the video i counted the individual red flashing lights that i dentified to be all the same, i counted 57 of them. i dont want to look up anymore
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Saw three bright lights appears, move around then vanish. then started seeing red lights moving in odd patterns.

content.detailedDescription: I am a truck driver and i was doing a delivery in norfolk ,nebraska on july 20/2011.Around 10pm i was looking for my arrived at final destination,when i started having a difficult time with the address i needed to find.As i was driving on w park ave west bound heading towards hwy 81.I was driving fairly slow,may be 10mph..When i noticed a pulsing bright sphere coming towards my direction.At first i thought it was a helicopter in the nightsky,but very soon i found out the light source was acting very abnormal for it to be a helicopter or a flying low craft airplane.The bright circle of light it had stoped and started pulsating and dimming its own glow,it remind me of a flash light in the dark running out of battery,pulsating on and off but in slow motion.Thats when i decided to stop the truck and turn on my flashing hazard lights.There was no traffic out in any direction so i stayed calmed and knowing that i could of   grabbed  my camara,it was one of those moments when you feel.. if you do! ,,you will miss out on what you are witnessing. i kept staring at it when its started moving slow towards me on the large 18wheeler rig.The glowing sphere got above the left side of the driver side, around 800 to 1000 ft in the sky.I noticed that it had descend from where it previously was , about 2miles down. as it paused above i was able to identify a much closer description of what i was witnessing.The sphere was a mass of yelloish glow with a clearish bubble form.The edge was pulsating a dim glow of soft yellowish gold light and the internal mass ,was a solid moving blur of some alive energy radiant glow of yellow light with some sort of blurry motion .It stayed above my left side ,which was south for around 3 to 4 seconds,there was a guy walking a large pitbull dog, not even aware of what was taking place above nor the dog.In a matter of 3 to 4 seconds the object retrieved back to where it was at first,at a tremendous speed. i felt almost like if it knew someone was paying attention to it,or the blinking lights of the truck had it come down to check on me.For a few seconds it  stayed put pulsating on and off... a few more seconds when slowly came back again ,very slow hovering by passing me. the lightsource was floating in a wabbling path motion,it also looked bubble like, clear and jellyish shape by then  it continued east with out any noise this whole time.I had my door window down, when i looked out still following it with a firm stare and saw that it had stoped above the information towers about a mile behind me,on the south east side of norfolk.The sphere hover above the towers in the center at an altitude around 100ft above the towers.By then i stare for another 20seconds and notice a redish glow appearing on the bottom of the object,like if it was copying the flashing red lights of the towers or becoming red to fit around the nightsky enviroment. thats when i decided to leave and felt i had seen enough.I end up driving away and finding my dropped place.The next day ,i had to drive south on hwy 81 ,i had to pass right by norfolk airport and did see a military army green truck there and a soldier dressed army cammo.I cant say for sure if that army staff at the airport had anything to do with, what i had seen the previous hrs.The one thing left me thinking was how the glowish sphere came close to were i was , once i had turn on my flashing hazards lights?..And i also noticed on my gps,that the place were the  ufo could had come from at first was by the far west of norfolk,which is nebraska national forest and reservoir.This west massive area of land is so large that its spreads out meeting with the unhabit lands of the state of wyoming and the south national grasslands of south dakota.After having this experience, i was left with a need of an explanation ,may be someone else in the area did witness the event... as today the answer to this appears to me that we are just another grain of life in the universe.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Glowing sphere hovering towards my direction ,it paused above .

content.summary: Glowing sphere hovering towards my direction ,it paused above .

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking towards home at about 22.00; dusk. i had been birdwatching so had binoculars. 

as i crossed a field, i saw an orange light, shining directionally towards the north, emitting a visible beam in low, broken cloud ahead of an approaching thunder storm. i stopped to watch, seeing the beam fade. i used binoculars then. the light extinguished, leaving a dark, angular object which hovered or moved slowly and without audible noise. no navigation lights were lit, nor any other light after the beam extinguished. this in spite of being only some five miles from a regional airport. i was about 200 yards from it horizontally and the object was, i would guess, at an elevatin of about 500 feet over houses. 

as the storm was rapidly approaching and rain starting to fall on my location, i decided to continue on my way, as i was standing in the middle of a field(!). the object was still there as i left.
content.summary: Directional light, fading, leaving dark, angular object hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in a church parking lot in the small town of quiouge, new york, talking to a friend who was facing me leaning on his car.  as we talked, i noticed a large bright white object in the sky (that came out of nowhere) moving horizontally from left to right about a mile up in the northern sky.  my friend could see i was distracted and i said, "oh my god!  what is that?"  as the words were coming out of my mouth, the bright white oval object split into two bright ovals that both decended in different directions and then disappeared.  by the time my friend turned around it was all over.  i am an air force brat and still live near an air base so i am very accustomed to seeing air planes and jets in the night sky.  this was no airplane or jet.

   i
content.summary: I was in a parking lot just before 9pm and  i noticed a very bright oval object in the sky much bigger than any star traveling horizontal (left to right) in the sky. then it split apart into two bright ovals that decended separately and dissappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
5 glowing orange fireballs/orbs approx. 15 degrees apart in arc. following each other and moving from s-sw to n-ne about 10 degrees off true n. very high in altitude, planes on the landing trajectory to the nearest airport fly very low. these were up in the 20-30 thousand feet range if not higher. followed, by the same distance, by a pair of 2 orange globes perpendicular/side by side, to the path the first 5 were following. the original 5 slowly faded, but the 2 following behind split into different directions, separating by about 45 degrees and stayed until the others had disappeared. checked 'heavens-above' and the nasa web site for orbital satellite info, because that was our first tought. they were probably com satellites in a procession. no information about satellites in our region at that time.    

this is the second time we've seen these over this area. 
the previous time, september 15, 2010, they were much lower, around 10k feet, and there were only 3 fireballs. we could make out an actual globe as the middle one, which seemingly was on fire on the front edge. i thought it was a re-entering piece of space junk. again, i checked the orbital plots of junk re-entering. nothing was posted on my online searches. 

is there a good website to check when these things are seen to see if it is a flare from a known satellite or re-entering space junk? 

and i don't know about affecting me psychologically but my husband sat up all night. it was really disturbing and not easily explained. i know there have been a rash of these "orange fireballs" lately, but they aren't planes. no landing lights (my husband used to work at an airline and can identify a plane from miles away.) now every time i see a plane coming into bishop airport i go "is that?" and i get a "yes, it's a plane" lol.

thanks.
content.summary: Orange / fireballs

content.detailedDescription: Star going straight up again
content.summary: Star going straight up again-pictures- video too large to send

content.detailedDescription: Myself my cousin and my best friend were out on the river plantation golf course in the middle of the night goofin off when i spotted a light comming thru the trees....We were at a green surrounded by high trees so u couldnt see far off in the distance as the light got brighter we were fixated on it as it came closer and it came to a hover right over the treeline above our heads the craft was so close i could have thrown a rock and hit it it made no noises at all u could hear crickets and nothing else it scared me so bad i took off running down the fairway to get out from underneath it i didnt know if it would fall on us but they stayed underneath the object bout 75 yds out i turned back to look and everything was weird kinda like time stopped or something i stood there frozen thinking we were gonna get beamed up or something and the craft sat there motionless without any noise whatsoever it looked to have sum kind of running lights but the bright light i had org saw had gone off .....Well like i said there was no noise at all and in the distance u could hear apache helicopters from the local airport/armybase and within about a minute of hearing the helis the craft slowly receeded back into the trees and we couldnt see it anymore and the apaches were straffing the area low level flying they were very loud u could hear em from way off but u couldnt hear the craft maybe 50 ft above us i cant tell u how big it was only tht when it came over us i had to run to get out from underneath it i dont know how to explain this i have felt crazy for a longtime and would think i was crazy if my cousin and friend werent there i dont tell people about this and we dont talk about it me and my best friend occasionally mention it to people and they laugh which pisses me off i cant explain it and idk that nite seemed to stop ina weird way idk but afterwards i didnt notice it for a longtime but there r 3 small pea sized scars ina triangle shape on my stomach under my right pectoral muscle that i cannot explain as to how it got there to this day i dont know how it got there and dont know what it is other than a weird 3 dot triangle type scar ........... this is the first time for me to come foward about something like this  i half *** think im crazy but i know im not its been years since its happened and i wouldnt want it to happen again it scared me worse than i think i h ave ever been scared....... and thats my story............
content.summary: Myself my cousin and my best friend were out on a golfcourse in the early morning hours goofin off and a ufo came over the trees above our heads followed by military helicopters from the local base

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were driving home from walgreens and were approaching a stop sign on moss hollow at hwy m.  we both noticed something orange in the air and could see glimpses through the trees as we drove.  when we got to the stop sign, we had an unobstructed view on our left side of what appeared to be an airborne object on fire hanging in the sky.  i pulled my car over at the stop sign and we both watched this smokeless "fire" hover over hwy m.  the object seemed to be no more than 200 feet from the ground and was about 300 feet southwest of my vehicle.  it sat absolutely motionless and was not producing any noise whatsoever.  after about 10 seconds of my daughter and i staring in scary amazement, the red & orange ball of fire began rising straight up and then shot off to the east.  it flew east very, very quickly, faded in the sky and then disappeared completely.        

when we arrived home, i got on my laptop and started searching for "flying fire", which to my amazement, is a fairly common ufo sighting.  i've heard of silver saucers and triangular shapes in the sky, but fire?!  truly an amazing, crazy, make-you-feel-small experience.
content.summary: Ball of fire hovering in the air

content.detailedDescription: While we were fishing as a local private lake my husband notices an odd dimly light triangle shape object coming out direction traveling in a south/west direction. he turned to me and told me to look at it to make sure he was really seeing what we both believe to be a ufo. it was traveling at a steady pace at about 70-80 miles per hour at about 1/4 to 1/2 mile up. it was very clearly a triangle shape and had very define points to it. we were both very baffled as to how something that shape could be flying in the night sky. the sky was free from and clouds and it was very clear out. as it passed by it blocked the view of the stars so we knew we were looking as a solid object. it was a very surreal feeling to be looking at this object. it kind of scared me a bit as well. being a very logical person i was going through things it might be in my head as i was analyzing it as it flew over. there was nothing that i could logically say it resembled that i have ever seen and i have seen many tv programs in military aircrafts and prototypes and this looked nothing like anything i have ever seen in my life. i would say the size would be in proportion with a 747 jet. it had 3 very dim square light at each triangle point. the lights were a white glow similar to a florescent bulb and they were casting a glow in between each light showing the triangle shape. as it flew over we noticed that there was no sound what so ever and as it passed us we could see the back of it as it glided over us. it was perfectly flying it a straight line and parallel to the sky. it never pivoted of veered off course. after it passed by we got a very good view of the back of the craft. it was a flat dark surface about 15 to 20 ft high. we continued to watch it until it was out of sight. i have to say that was a very eerie feeling and i will never forget what i saw that night.
content.summary: We saw a ufo of triangle shape with square white lights flying overhead on july 23, 2011 at 11:06 pm while fishing in anaheim, ca

content.detailedDescription:
Electrical flash of energy light (lightening like) no sounds, completely over water at the horizon, 1/2 dome shape, reddish-pinkish glowing misty light in the distance @ the horizon, the entire length.  same instant complete electrical outage in the town

where:  hilo, hawaii  
date:  thursday, august 4, 2011
time:  1:50 a.M.
i was getting ready to go to sleep.  i was looking directly out of the window toward the ocean and horizon when the flash of light caught my eye's attention, i thought what the heck, and then i saw the 1/2 dome shape completely over top the ocean's water at the horizon, behind hale moano condominiums, kalanianaole avenue.

the electrical flash of light made me think it was lightening, which is rare? in hawaii, there was no thunder to accompany the flash of light.  but a huge reddish orangish light dome was clearly visible above the water.  

i thought it was lightening, and a dome light.  the dome was stationary.  i did not know what it was.  i was tired and all the electrical power was out, throughout the neighborhood and perhaps the town, for many hours afterwards.

no motion, just light. other than the 'lightening flash'

i was tired and went to sleep, in the dark of night.

i am writing you this report now, because i think it is was something important.

i closed my eyes and did not think any more about it.  just that, it was pretty cool and i wonder what happened to the electrical power throughout the neighborhood.  my impression was haarp.
content.summary: Electrical flash of energy light (lightening like) no sounds, completely over water at the horizon, 1/2 dome shape, reddish-pinkish glowing misty light in the distance @ the horizon, the entire length.  same instant complete electrical outage in the town

content.detailedDescription: On july 20 at aproxamatly 7:30 pm my two boys and me was outside playing badmitton. my oldest son had went to pick the little birdy up off the ground that goes to the badmitton,and he happened to have looked up in the sky and noticed this unique flying type saucer up in the sky and he had pointed it out to me and said look momma that looks like a flying boat.The reason he said that is because, my husnand had made a boat/kyak that looked just like this thing in the sky.We just couldn't stop looking at it.We had never seen nothing like it before and we was trying to figure out what it was.It like huverd over the top of the tree for i say like half a minute and it had red ligths on the bottom and the lights went clockwise.Well it aventually left the area.It flew off so fast.We were not scared at all by this.It was actually neat to see this object.I never really belived in ufo's and stuff,but every since i saw this flying saucer type thing in the sky it has changed my belief in it.
content.summary: Gray metalic disk with red lights going clockwise on bottom hovering then flew away very fast

content.detailedDescription: We live directly on the ct. river in agawam mass.On 08/10/11 at aprox 10 pm myself and my wife witnessed a very bright crimson ball/sphere hovering on the other side of the river.We watched it stay stationary for maybe 10 seconds when we ran out on the deck.The object then started to slowly drop .We lost sight of it as it went below the tree line.This was definatley not an airplane.I am 99.9% sure this was not a helicopter either.Just our luck the object dropped past the tree line just as my wife got her camera.
content.summary: Glowing orb in sky above tree line

content.detailedDescription: It was around 9:30pm i was laying in bed and heard my mom yelling for me. i ignored her like usual until she said ufo! she said look out the window there is a bright light just sitting still it looks like a star until it moves. i went out to the backyard and saw what looked like a huge bright star. at the time there was no movement. then all of a sudden it started to move my way just a little then stopped again.At this time it still looked like a bright star and there was no noise. then right before it started moving again a humming/jet like sound started coming from it.Then it started moving and it went from a bright ball of light to a triangular shape and you could see a few blue and green lights on it. it moved really fast after that and by the time i made it to the front yard it was gone but you could see the back of a helicopter going in the same direction it went. how was i feeling when i saw it? excited and nervous
content.summary: No movement looked like star then moved a little stopped then went fast

content.detailedDescription: Going to work on paletown rd in richland town pa. noticed brite orbs hovering in the sky in a dark field to my right. had a staircase pattern to them - sitting in the sky - pattern like they were on a staircase.  no noise, no movement at all.  white roundish colored orbs with a redish, orange, outline around the orbs.  had to go to work could not stop to investigate. but it is an area i know very well. i drive down this road every night and i never saw anything like this. had a car driving behind me as i was looking at these objects - could not stop my car - had a tailgatter behind me. if i were not going to work and did not get points for being late or absent i would have pulled over and gotten a much better view of these things.  i had a previous sighting back in 1977. a saucer was sitting over my house in doylestown pa. i have already reported the story many years ago so i won't go into it again. i am surprised to witness another ufo event but after you see what i have seen close up. i already know that ufo's are real and coming here for an unknown reason.  probably just investigating like we do on unknown planets.
content.summary: Brite orbs hovering in a staircase pattern up into the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I left my office and was traveling west on 23rd street in independence, missouri just past noland road when i saw a huge disc shaped dull gray metallic object hovering at what looked like the north half of downtown kansas city directly to my west and slightly north.  you can see the kc skyline clearly from the high hill i was driving on.  as a ufo investigator, i shouldn't be shocked by anything, but in this case, i was very surprised by what i saw, especially since i had received a report earlier in the day from a witness who described a similar very large craft in south kansas city.  
the object did not move and i saw it clearly for two to three seconds, which was long enough to know i saw something. it was a disk shape, with flat sides, and a domed top.  i could not see any details or lights.  i estimate the size to be 5 miles wide.  i immediately called several people i knew and other mufon field investigators to see if they could see anything from their vantage point.  
after i arrived home, i found that i had left my good cameras at the office and only had my cell phone camera (it figures).  so i went outside and started taking random photos of the sky.  just as i turned the camera off i noticed what looked like a commercial jet flying at high speed and low (maybe 5,000 ft or less) and almost completely sideways with both wings clearly visible!  it was banking hard to the left heading from northeast to southwest. that type of manuever is usually reserved for smaller craft and fighter jets, not a commercial airliner.  the jet was a silver and peach color - the peach may have been a reflection of the sun. i tried to get the camera ready again but was not fast enough. total time in view was approximately six seconds. right after the jet was out of sight, a large round white object the size of a dinner plate at arm's length with a hole in the center appeared and disappeared in the exact same location as where i first saw the jet appear, or when i first noticed it.
i then posted a message to the missouri mufon chat list about what was going on and after receiving some other messages put together a timeline of events. 
-12:15 pm - a witness called to report a giant ufo over south kansas city (see other report filed)
-1:30 - 3:00 pm a ufo spotter and photographer in topeka, kansas (72 miles from kc) photographs multiple ufos in "battle mode."  he has been able to capture ufos on film using a special method and ab uv sunglasses. 
-2:00 pm - a kc mufon member reported a large number of uh-60 helicopters flying very low at treetop level at 125th and state line in south kansas city.  this is definitely not a normal occurrence for that area.
- 4:20 pm - i saw the large disc over downtown kc, then the plane and white disc. 
- 5:20 pm - a mufon field investigator saw a strange cloud with structure north of latan, mo from his vantage point across the river in kansas. 
- 10:30 pm - my daughter called, she was watching the skies and saw a black helicopter with no markings flying very low at tree top level in independence, mo, just a few blocks from my house. 
- 3:00 am sunday - st. louis, mo- a mufon field investigator and her entire neighborhood were awakened by a very loud strange banging and humming noise along with what sounded like gunfire, that lasted for several minutes. the vibration seemed to be coming from a spot in the sky. they have not identified the source yet. 

note: i don't know if this is related, but since it is also strange i thought i'd mention it. the next day (sunday) a big storm came in very quickly with high winds that caused a large number of power outages throughout the city and took our power out for 7 hours.  just prior to the storm, i took my nikon camera outside to take some pictures as it came in. i had the camera set at 1/200 sec without flash and multi-shot mode.  i took 6 pictures in a row, then analyzed them.  in one shot out of the series there are multiple orbs in my yard, and in subsequent photos there are tiny red and blue lights that can't be explained. no rain was falling at that point.  after taking the photos, i went inside and the lights flickered on and off six times.  i then took a nap (which is unusual for me) and was unaware that the power had gone completely off.  i was in a dead sleep, and was awakened by a loud static noise with lots of voices talking at the same time coming from the radio.  i sat up and looked at the radio, but the power was out so it should have been impossible for that to happen.  

on monday, we had two guests and a guest speaker from st. louis mufon attend our monthly meeting. after it was over we were standing outside talking and i saw a bullet-shaped white line, then a white crescent shaped object appear and dissapear very quickly. these were west of our location in westport in kansas city.  no one else saw anything. i am surmising that some of these objects are things that come into view for a short period of time, and are noticed by clairvoyants like me, but not by others. perhaps they are entering or exiting wormholes, or are cloaked somehow and uncloak accidentially for a few seconds.
content.summary: Huge disc -shaped object hoovering over downtown kansas city

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone today by the witness who wishes to remain anonymous: 

"i was driving to pick up a late dinner at gates barbeque on 40 highway in independence, missouri when i noticed a strange black or dark color object in the sky to the west of me headed in a southeast to northwest direction. it looked like the shape of a hockey puck with a slightly raised top and bottom.  it had five very bright round white lights on the side of it, and that is what really caught my eye since you don't normally see planes or helicopters with lights like that. the lights did not pulsate or move. the object moved along the same flight path the entire time i watched it while driving to gates, but once i got to my destination the trees blocked my view and i could no longer see it.  the object was at 50-60 degrees up from the horizon and it would take 1/3 or more of a thumb to cover it up.  there was no sound or emissions, and it moved at about the same rate of speed as a commercial aircraft would, except it was flying pretty low-- lower than commercial aircraft fly around here.  the airports are not close to this area so we don't see low-flying aircraft except for the occasional helicopter. i just thought this was really odd and decided to call someone to tell them about it. i'm sending a drawing."
content.summary: Hockey puck like object with five bright lights over kansas city

content.detailedDescription: Replaced "hq@mufon.Com" with "the mutual ufo network"
content.summary: Cms test case - witness email notification

content.detailedDescription: On the 9th of august 2011, at roughly 21:50, i observed what seemed to be a ufo. i was in my bedroom looking out of the window into the sky and i noticed a plane fly by at regular altitude and speed. just as it escaped from my line of sight, a red/orange, pulsating/blinking object appeared out of nowhere at roughly the same altitude but it's speed was nearly unbelieveable. it must have been travelling atleast 4 or 5 times quicker than the plane that just flew by. 2000-2500 mph would be a rough estimate of it's speed. it looked as if it followed the exact same flight path of the plane (south east). it flew in a straight line as if it was chasing the plane for some reason. it flew in a way that seemed too perfect. it felt like a dream or like i was imagining it. i dismissed it like it meant nothing but earlier on today (10th of august 2011) my friend informed me that he also saw a ufo at the same time on the same day. i told him to describe everything about it and from what i gathered from him, it must have been the same light i saw the previous night. i realised i had to report it to clear my mind but i know i'll probably never know the truth...
content.summary: Ufo seen following a plane at very high speeds. it glowed a reddy/orange colour. very surreal.
